Description: Verify that the function returns 0 when given an empty string as input.
Check that the function returns 0 when the input string contains a single zero.
Test the addition of two positive integers separated by a comma.
Ensure that the function ignores numbers greater than 1000 in the input string.
Verify that the function correctly handles a custom delimiter (in this case, `;`) and returns the sum of the numbers.
Test the addition of numbers separated by both newline and comma delimiters.
Ensure that the function raises an appropriate exception when the input contains negative numbers.
Verify that the function can handle an unknown number of comma-separated values and returns the correct sum.
Verify that the function can handle custom delimiters of arbitrary length (e.g., ***) and return the correct sum of the numbers.
